meanings.definition: A type of antiviral medication used to treat infections caused by certain viruses.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed ganciclovirs to help fight the virus.
meanings.sent2: Patients often rely on ganciclovirs to combat viral infections.
meanings.sent3: The ganciclovirs danced their way into the virus and defeated it!
meanings.sent4: Like tiny warriors, ganciclovirs battled the viral invaders in the body.
meanings.sent5: The ganciclovirs acted like shields, protecting the body from harmful viruses.

meanings.definition: The plural form of ganciclovir, referring to multiple doses or instances of the medication.
meanings.sent1: She picked up the ganciclovirs from the pharmacy for her treatment.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on ganciclovirs for the upcoming flu season.
meanings.sent3: The ganciclovirs in the cabinet seemed to multiply overnight!
meanings.sent4: In the battle against the virus, the ganciclovirs stood united in their fight.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the reassuring presence of ganciclovirs, ready to heal.
